name: @astuteo/breakout-grid
description: CSS Grid breakout layout system with visual configurator
author: Astuteo LLC

scripts.build: vite build && vite build --mode lite && npm run build:css
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run check-files
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && npm run check-version && git add -A && git commit -m "$(node -p 'require(`./package.json`).version')" && git tag "v$(node -p 'require(`./package.json`).version')" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && npm run check-version && git add -A && git commit -m "$(node -p 'require(`./package.json`).version')" && git tag "v$(node -p 'require(`./package.json`).version')" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && npm run check-version && git add -A && git commit -m "$(node -p 'require(`./package.json`).version')" && git tag "v$(node -p 'require(`./package.json`).version')" && git push && git push --tags
